text: Citricoccus nitrophenolicus is a Gram-positive, para-nitrophenol-degrading and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Citricoccus which has been isolated from sludge from a wastewater treatment plant from Northern Jutland in Denmark. ==References== ==External links== * microbewiki Category:Bacteria described in 2012 Category:Micrococcineae
title: Citricoccus nitrophenolicus
